product.title: Cotswold Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
product.description: Ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with the blind's coordinating accessories, creates a united and streamlined look. Transform a neutral room into a smart and usable home office space by mixing the oatmeal gloss with sister creams and on-trend coppers.

relproducts.title: Rimini Sand - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Stone Beige
relproducts.description: Stirlo stone beige plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Putty Beige
relproducts.description: Stirlo putty beigeplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Oat Beige
relproducts.description: Stirlooat beige plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Calaf Beige Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Here we have a pale beige vertical blind, its light enough in colour to be subtle at the window but still injects some colour into a design scheme. The pattern on the calaf fabric is inspired by the natural curved shape of a leaf and includes a soft sheen too. This blind w here we have a pale beige vertical blind, its light enough in colour to be subtle at the window but still injects some colour into a design scheme.

relproducts.title: Welwyn Biscuit Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: We especially like this welwyn biscuit vertical blind, it gives us a warm fuzzy feeling inside. We think its the sunny neutral shade that does it. You can share their fuzzy feeling in any room you like by adding this blind. Itll look fab anywhere, even a bathroom. And itll l we especially like this welwyn biscuit vertical blind, it gives us a warm fuzzy feeling inside.

relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Beige Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: This valenica simplicity vertical blind is light beige, just like an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru but whatever you call it, it's a nice neutral colour that adds just enough tone to your window. Its got a contemporary flavour and won't look out of place this valenica simplicity vertical blind is light beige, just like an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ghost White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Soft Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece. The major appeal though is in the fabric itself, a tactile and soft weave that you'll almost want to wrap around yourself and the lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ebony - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats. Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for privacy and light-blocking or completely open for light and ventilation. Form a classy living area by opting for a traditional chocolate and cream colour palette, placing the oatmeal gloss against a dark brown focal wall and surrounding cream walls.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Mono Biscuit Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their range of decorative slats are the perfect alternative to a plain, single colour venetian blind. This cream venetian blind is the perfect alternative to a plain blind as the striped pattern will add style to your room. relproducts.title: Beige
relproducts.description: Beige satin metal venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Alabaster - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Beautiful, creamy beige will fill your windows when you use the spectrum alabasta. The gleaming gloss finish offsets the high quality and durability of the heavy gauge aluminium slats, whilst still maintaining an air of elegance and sophistication. Soften bold reds and deep purples in the dining room or bedroom by placing the alabasta amongst rich, block colour walls, and accenting with matching creams and beiges.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Deep Alabaster - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The rich cream of the spectrum's deep alabasta is contemporary style at its finest, combining high quality, sturdy aluminium slats with colour-coordinated pull-cords and rails to create a neutral, easy-on-the-eye blind that will stand the test of time. Use the alabasta to complement deep purples or forest greens in the living room, den, or dining room, where it will create a subtle break to rich colours.

relproducts.title: Parchment Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: If youre looking for a blind that works hard so you dont have to, whilst looking great, then the search is over. This parchment faux wood blind goes straight to the top of their list. The robust slats carry a wonderful not-quite-white tone, creamy undertones for a softer look. T if youre looking for a blind that works hard so you dont have to, whilst looking great, then the search is over.

relproducts.title: Gloss Beige Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: If you're looking for a gloss beige aluminium venetian blind, look no more as this is the one for you. There isn't much more we can say about this silky, glossy beige aluminium slat other than how great it looks. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

relproducts.title: Sand Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Brushed Sand
relproducts.description: Brushed sand brushed metal venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Litra Putty
relproducts.description: Litra putty texture metal venetian blind.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.
